name: Let's Go Camping(Let's Go Jamming)
lyric:
Be a good boy for a whole week
Stuck in the car
Sardined on the streets
Summer's here
Bodies in heat
You know
What I mean
Pack some hot dogs
We need some meat
To do the hard work
To make us complete
Summer's here
Everything's in heat
Let's give us a treat
It's time for me
To have some fun
Just some causal fun
Don't have to ask no one
Don't have to ask no one
It's time for you to have some fun
It's gonna be a blast
Don't be shy just
Come
It's time for me to have some fun
Just some causal fun
Don't have to ask no one
It's time for you to have some fun
It's gonna be a blast
Don't be shy just
It's time for me to have some fun
Just some causal fun
Don't have to ask no one
It's time for you to have some fun
It's gonna be a blast
Don't be shy just come
Let's get started
Hop off the truck
Pitch a tent
Unload some stuff
The flap is down
Just the two of us
Let's keep out the bugs
